eu.tivian.musico.database

Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • eu.tivian.musico.database.DatabaseHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class DatabaseHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    A helper class to manage database creation and version management.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static String DATABASE_NAME
      The database file name.
      private static int DATABASE_VERSION
      Current schema version for the database.
      private static String SQL_DROP_TABLE
      SQL statement used to drop tables.
      private static String[] SQL_FIELDS
      The name of static fields in contract class DatabaseContract used to initialize properly the database on creation.
      private static String SQL_TABLE_NAME
      The name of the static field in contract class DatabaseContract used to find all table names present in the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseHelper(Context context)
      Create a helper object to create, open, and/or manage a database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseHelper

        DatabaseHelper(Context context)
        Create a helper object to create, open, and/or manage a database. This method always returns very quickly. The database is not actually created or opened until one of getWritableDatabase() is called.
        Parameters:
        context - to use for locating paths to the the database.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(SQLiteDatabase db)
        Called when the database is created for the first time. This is where the creation of tables and the initial population of the tables should happen.
        Specified by:
        onCreate in class SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        db - the database.

      • onUpgrade

        public void onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase db,
                      int oldVersion,
                      int newVersion)
        Called when the database needs to be upgraded. The implementation should use this method to drop tables, add tables, or do anything else it needs to upgrade to the new schema version.
        Specified by:
        onUpgrade in class SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        db - the database.
        oldVersion - the old database version.
        newVersion - the new database version.

      • getWritableDatabase

        public SQLiteDatabase getWritableDatabase()
        Create and/or open a database that will be used for reading and writing. The first time this is called, the database will be opened and onCreate(SQLiteDatabase), onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase, int, int) and/or SQLiteOpenHelper.onOpen(SQLiteDatabase) will be called.
        This function enables the foreign keys check.
        Overrides:
        getWritableDatabase in class SQLiteOpenHelper
        Returns:
        a read/write database object valid until SQLiteClosable.close() is called.
